title: Quantum Mechanics- Franz Mandl, Wiley 2013E [Epub]
description:
Quantum Mechanics/ Franz Mandl
Originally Published: 1992
Ebook Published: June, 2013
Publisher: Wiley
Format: Retail Epub
ISBN: 9781118728895

_______________________________________________________________________

Offers a concise depiction of quantum mechanics concentrating on general principles, concepts and techniques of wide applicability without taking them to full generality. To bring the subject to life, the theory is applied to the all important field of atomic physics. Great flexibility is achieved through the use of a flow diagram and starred sections which make it possible to omit topics and vary the order in which they are studied. Illuminating problems and hints for their solution are provided.
